description: Birendra Kumar Kanodia is a Nepalese politician affiliated with the Nepali Congress party. He is a member of the Lumbini Provincial Assembly, where he was also elected as the parliamentary party leader and serves as the current Leader of the Opposition. He was elected to the assembly in the 2017 provincial elections from Kapilvastu constituency 3(B). Previously, Kanodia served as a member of the Pratinidhi Sabha (House of Representatives) from 1999 to 2002. In 2001, he was appointed Assistant Minister for Water Resources in Prime Minister Sher Bahadur Deuba's cabinet, a role he held until 2002.
short_description: Nepali politician and member of the Lumbini Provincial Assembly, where he serves as the leader of the opposition.
